programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Miami never disappoints, and these four bouts emphasize the talent coming out of the Sunshine State. Suarez vs Williamson, Meyer vs Famez and Davis vs Wilson take place in the Magic City along with women's flyweight scrap between Rodriguez & Franco.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: An exciting bare knuckle fight between Truckon Carson vs Daishaun Middleton opens up the show followed by Derek Perez vs Sam Samples, Jeremiah Scott vs Chevvy Bridges, and Jeremie Halloway challenges Cameron VanCamp.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Featuring Nathan Rivera vs Jaymes Hyder, Sawyer Depee trades hands with Jonathan Miller, Julian Lane fights Murat Kazgan and David Mundell battles challenger Doug Coltrane in a middleweight title fight.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Rosalinda Rodriguez vs Christina Crist & More
